content.heading: <article> Tag
paragraphs: The <article> tag defines independent, self-contained content.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Suitable for forum posts, blog posts, or news stories.
Style with CSS for visual distinction.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 6.0, Edge 9.0, Firefox 4.0, Safari 5.0, Opera 11.1.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
Browser

This is a web browser.
